Name: Average time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average time from Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION to Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Total time spent on Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION and the end of the case

Name: Average time between Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION and Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION in cases where re-submission occurs
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Total resolution time of Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION before a Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER or Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER occurs
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Minimum time to re-submission after Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Average time from Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION to Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR in cases where re-submission leads to approval
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Total time from Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION to Request Payment in successful re-submission cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Average time it takes for a case to be closed after Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Minimum resolution time of Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION in cases followed by Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Average time between Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION and next activity in the process
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION and the end of the case

Name: Total time for all activities to be completed after Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION and the end of the case

Name: Average waiting time to the next Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE after Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Total time it takes from Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION to the next Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION in cases of successful appeal
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average time from Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION to Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER in cases leading to rejection by pre-approver
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
